name: Bargain ssp Wargame
description:
Naval Grid Based , turn based Hard core Wargame.

You drag Map around and use RADAR/SONAR Database to identify good targets, But Watch out for Air bases or enemy carriers , as their air units will defend there units. Try to sink the enemy transport ships as they supply bases, in turn the bases will supply ships. Ships repair and refuel at bases. You ca launch strategic bombers from bases and Para drops to disrupt enemy supply.

The A.I. can control every ship your and enemy, and the game is not for micro managing your fleet you can let the A.I. run things, take control of ships that look like good options. You can also set Convoys or Speed of Ships. you can set Combat Air Patrol Area, the air units will be more effective with smaller area to cover. Ports and bases have sizes and max sizes you can bomb them to stop them getting to fill strength.
